backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing plan creation, update, retrieval, enquiry submission, access control, and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves existing userProfiles and plans without structural changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color tokens, light/dark themes, and base element resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, title, root container, and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling hash-based navigation between the home marketing page and LIC Plans page.
Marketing About section displaying advisor values, expertise, and a detailed 'Why Choose Me' feature list.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Renders a contact section with static contact details and embeds the ContactForm component.
Implements a validated enquiry form with state management and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQ.ts: Displays an FAQ section using an accordion to show predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Provides the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Renders the hero section with headline content, calls-to-action, trust indicators, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Navbar: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu support.
Renders a grid of insurance plan cards with features and a scroll-to-contact button, highlighting the most popular plan.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays a grid of service cards with icons and descriptions plus a decorative image section.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Testim: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlans.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating insurance plans through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit customer enquiries to the backend and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme colors, typography, and premium table styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LICPlans.tsx: React page handling LIC plan uploads, validation, OCR processing, and admin interactions with plan data.
frontend/src/utils/ocr.ts: Simulated OCR utilities that extract placeholder text from images and parse it into structured plan data.
Filename matching utilities that derive plan titles, score candidates, group files, and pick the best match per plan.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-backed persisted values.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Simple validation helpers for required fields, emails, and phone numbers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, existing features, pending requests, and known build/deploy issues for the LIC Plans imageâ€‘assignment workflow. Defines requirements for plan image upload, matching, updating, and deployment error handling.
